        authorID: 2336
        addTime: 2019-10-25T16:00:00.000Z
        content: >-
            2048位的RSA目前应该还没有那么好破解。 --（需要20m个qubits才能破解2048位RSA） \[Researchers\]
            have shown how a quantum computer could do the calculation with just
            20 million qubits. Indeed, they show that such a device would take
            just eight hours to complete the calculation.
            [https://qubitreport.com/quantum-computing-cybersecurity-and-](https://qubitreport.com/quantum-computing-cybersecurity-and-)
            cryptography/2019/06/07/2048-bit-rsa-cracked-in-8-hours/


            \--(目前Google的量子计算机只有53位) Fortunately, it has only 53 qubits which
            the Shor’s Algorithm may take millions of qubits to crack the
            2048-bit key!
            [https://medium.com/@jonathan\_hui/quantum-supremacy-google-sycamore-processor-6f30073a17fa](https://medium.com/@jonathan_hui/quantum-supremacy-google-sycamore-processor-6f30073a17fa)

            @[FH7](/member/FH7) #1 解密之後 是這個意思？java.security.InvalidKeyException:
            IOException : DER input, Integer tag error
date: 2019-10-31T16:00:00.000Z
category: 分享发现
---

Matters 文章 [https://bit.ly/2omcZCu](https://bit.ly/2omcZCu)

临时试验工具 在线RSA加密工具 （RSA必须选4096，据说2048的已能被中国暴力破解） [https://www.devglan.com/online-tools/rsa-encryption-decryption](https://www.devglan.com/online-tools/rsa-encryption-decryption) 在线AES加密工具 [https://www.devglan.com/online-tools/aes-encryption-decryption](https://www.devglan.com/online-tools/aes-encryption-decryption)

Dimension 团队 [https://dimension.im/](https://dimension.im/) 的两个工具 [https://maskbook.com/](https://maskbook.com/) 电脑 [https://tessercube.com/](https://tessercube.com/) 移动

其它工具 [https://www.openkeychain.org/](https://www.openkeychain.org/)

我的临时public key 欢迎留言
